name: Maruti Jimny
description: The price of Maruti Jimny, a 4 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 12.74  - 15.00 Lakh. It is available in 6 variants, with an engine of 1462 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Jimny comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Jimny has a ground clearance of 210 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 16.39 to 16.94 kmpl for Jimny.
